description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 5 (Contamination), 8 (Sustainability and Energy) of planning permission ref. 60653/APP/2022/531, dated 10/03/2023 (Erection of no. 4 x two storey terraced houses and no.2 x two storey semi-detached houses, with associated car parking and landscaping works)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge only of 5i (a, b and c) i.e. (Desk Study, Site Investigation and Remediation Method Statement) of the approved planning application 60653/APP/2022/531. Further details related to 5(ii, iii and iv) of the condition are required in order to fully discharge the condition.
